TITLE: AI Embedding
DEF: Embedding text for use in Large Language Models.
TASK: The AI Embedding pattern dicusses the use of a computational method to cross-reference discussions with a factual knowledge base. A mathematicl function describes "how similar" elements of the knowledge base are to a query., or the point of the discourse. Similar elements can then be retrieved and injected into the conversaton. This requires a bit of programming.
